properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 16 at 2:48AM MST until January 17 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Salt Lake City UT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches.
Winds gusting as high as 35 mph.

* WHERE...Southwest Wyoming.

* WHEN...From 2 AM to 5 PM MST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing and
drifting snow could create very hazardous travel conditions
including along Interstate 80 throughout the day Friday.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling. Keep a winter survival
kit in your vehicles when travel through southwest wyoming
Friday.

For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including
Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit
weather.gov/slc/winter.

For winter road conditions from the Wyoming Department of
Transportation, visit http://www.wyoroad.info or dial 511.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 5 PM MST FRIDAY
